sentence.Network_en: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是七月的最后一天,风水师父说是个吉祥的日子.

sentence.Network_en: Don't be scared by what the geomancer has told you , they are all cheats.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要被阴阳先生的话唬住啊, 那都是骗人的!

sentence.Network_en: We will invite a geomancer to check the terrain before they build a building.
sentence.Network_cn: 家里建房前会找阴阳生看看地形.
